modName: All Unique Items Dragon Priest Masks and Daedric Artifacts LEGENDARY EDITION
descriptionHtml:
I have painstakingly put together a batch file which gives you all unique items, dragon priest masks, and daedric artifacts from vanilla Skyrim as well as all DLCs. I feel like this will be a useful batch file for anyone who wants to test out/make a unique items retexture or remodel, as well as for people who just want to have all the uniques.

[b]Installation (Omega Noob Edition)[/b]

1) Copy AllUniques.txt into your Skyrim folder (where TESV.exe is located)

2) Run Skyrim, go in game, bring up the console (~) and type "bat AllUniques"

[b]IMPORTANT - YOU MUST HAVE YOUR PLUGIN LOAD ORDER LOOK LIKE THIS:[/b]

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Dawnguard.esm
HearthFires.esm
DragonBorn.esm

[b]BECAUSE THE DAWNGUARD STUFF IS UNDER "02" AND THE DRAGONBORN STUFF IS UNDER "04."[/b]

If you're using USKP, I would recommend upgrading to the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url] so it doesn't affect your load order, or just going into the .txt file and manually editing it yourself to reflect your load order.

Feel free to leave any feedback and let me know if I missed anything as well as edit the .txt as much as you like to meet your needs. Enjoy!

BATCH FILES BY YA BOY ALPHA:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77932/?]All Spells Powers and Shouts LEGENDARY EDITION[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77947/?]All Unique Items Dragon Priest Masks and Daedric Artifacts LEGENDARY EDITION[/url]
author: Alphazombie220
